inscription:
Signature; Inscription; Date
Strip on cardboard on former backing sheet with ornamented pattern in pencil with inscription: [autoretrato en Toledo, España 1963]
see Signed
medium: Pen, brush, black ink, brown ink and wash on paper
signed: UR in black ink: [Cuevas]; UR in brown ink: [autoretrato en Toledo]; LR: [MAYO-1963/ TOLEDO, ESPAÑA]; Verso (On board), top in black ink: [José Luis Cuevas \'Autoretrato en TOLEDO/ MAYO-1963]
title: Self-Portrait at Toledo
